</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You sense magical dangers. When using the [Detect Magic](/Actions.aspx?ID=513) exploration activity, you can roll initiative twice and use the better result so long as at least one opponent has a [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) effect or magic item and is in range of your [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66).
